name: nest-protect-mcp
description: MCP server for monitoring and controlling Nest Protect smoke and CO detectors
author: Sandra Schi

project_id.description: Google Cloud Project ID for Nest API

client_id.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID for Nest API

client_secret.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret for Nest API

refresh_token.description: OAuth 2.0 Refresh Token for Nest API

update_interval.description: How often to check for device updates (in seconds)

prompts.name: get_device_status_prompt
prompts.description: Get the status of Nest Protect devices
prompts.template: Show me the status of {device_name} including {details}.

prompts.name: check_alarms_prompt
prompts.template: Are there any active {alarm_type} alarms? Show me {details_level} information.

prompts.name: test_device_prompt
prompts.template: Run a {test_type} test on the {location} Nest Protect.

prompts.name: hush_alarm_prompt
prompts.template: {action} the alarm on the {location} Nest Protect for {duration} minutes.

prompts.name: get_battery_status_prompt
prompts.template: Show me the battery status of {device_filter} devices, sorted by {sort_by}.

prompts.name: get_device_history_prompt
prompts.template: Show me {event_type} events for {device_name} from {start_time} to {end_time}.

prompts.name: check_connectivity_prompt
prompts.template: Which Nest Protects are currently {status}? Show me {details}.

prompts.name: get_device_info_prompt
prompts.template: Show me {details_level} information about the {location} Nest Protect.

prompts.name: check_environment_prompt
prompts.template: What are the current {sensor_type} readings from {device_filter}?
